code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  minCharacters ( string  a ,  string  b )  {   const  int  m  =  a . length ();   const  int  n  =  b . length ();   vector < int >  countA ( 26 );   vector < int >  countB ( 26 );   for  ( const  char  c  :  a )   ++ countA [ c  -  'a' ];   for  ( const  char  c  :  b )   ++ countB [ c  -  'a' ];   int  ans  =  INT_MAX ;   int  prevA  =  0 ;    int  prevB  =  0 ;    for  ( char  c  =  'a' ;  c  <=  'z' ;  ++ c )  {     ans  =  min ( ans ,  m  +  n  -  countA [ c  -  'a' ]  -  countB [ c  -  'a' ]);     if  ( c  >  'a' )   ans  =  min ({ ans ,  m  -  prevA  +  prevB ,  n  -  prevB  +  prevA });   prevA  +=  countA [ c  -  'a' ];   prevB  +=  countB [ c  -  'a' ];   }   return  ans ;   }  };
